name: easy crochet scarf
notes:
do you want to learn how to crochet a scarf? if so, this free pattern is a perfect choice – especially for beginners. it’s a simple and easy ribbed scarf pattern that will teach you all the basics of crocheting.

this scarf is a great project if you are just learning how to crochet, or need something quick and easy to make as a gift.

this scarf is worked lengthwise. it has a ribbed appearance created by working the stitches through the back loops of the previous row. 

it calls for super bulky yarn, but can be made with 2 strands of heavier worsted-weight yarn held together. additional tools: yarn needle or tapestry needle, scissors, stitch markers (optional), and ruler or tape measure (optional).

**size**
66″ long and 6″ wide for an adult size scarf.

**gauge**
7.5 sts per 4″ in hdc blo
